verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Jehovah <WH3068>, remember <WH2142> for David <WH1732> All his affliction <WH6031>;
How he sware <WH7650> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, And vowed <WH5087> unto the Mighty <WH46> One of Jacob <WH3290>:
Surely I will not come <WH935> into the tabernacle <WH168> of my house <WH1004>, Nor go up <WH5927> into my bed <WH6210>;
I will not give <WH5414> sleep <WH8153> to mine eyes <WH5869>, Or slumber <WH8572> to mine eyelids <WH6079>;
Until I find out <WH4672> a place <WH4725> for Jehovah <WH3068>, A tabernacle <WH4908> for the Mighty <WH46> One of Jacob <WH3290>.
Lo <WH8085>, we heard of it in Ephrathah <WH672>: We found <WH4672> it in the field <WH7704> of the wood <WH3293>.
We will go <WH935> into his tabernacles <WH4908>; We will worship <WH7812> at his footstool <WH1916>.
Arise <WH6965>, O Jehovah <WH3068>, into thy resting-place <WH4496>; Thou <WH727>, and the ark of thy strength <WH5797>.
Let thy priest <WH3548> be clothed <WH3847> with righteousness <WH6664>; And let thy saints <WH2623> shout for joy <WH7442>.
For thy servant <WH5650> David <WH1732>'s sake Turn not away <WH7725> the face <WH6440> of thine anointed <WH4899>.
Jehovah <WH3068> hath sworn <WH7650> unto David <WH1732> in truth <WH571>; He will not turn <WH7725> from it <WH6529>: Of the fruit of thy body <WH990> will I set <WH7896> upon thy throne <WH3678>.

If thy children <WH1121> will keep <WH8104> my covenant <WH1285> And my testimony <WH5713> that <WH2090> I shall teach <WH3925> them <WH1121>, Their children also shall sit <WH3427> upon thy throne <WH3678> for evermore <WH5703>.
For Jehovah <WH3068> hath chosen <WH977> Zion <WH6726>; He hath desired <WH183> it for his habitation <WH4186>.
This is my resting-place <WH4496> for ever <WH5703>: Here will I dwell <WH3427>; For I have desired it <WH183>.
I will abundantly <WH1288> bless <WH1288> her provision <WH6718>: I will satisfy <WH7646> her poor <WH34> with bread <WH3899>.
Her priests <WH3548> also will I clothe <WH3847> with salvation <WH3468>; And her saints <WH2623> shall shout aloud <WH7442> for joy <WH7444>.
There will I make <WH6779> the horn <WH7161> of David <WH1732> to bud <WH6779>: I have ordained <WH6186> a lamp <WH5216> for mine anointed <WH4899>.
His enemies <WH341> will I clothe <WH3847> with shame <WH1322>; But upon himself shall his crown <WH5145> flourish <WH6692>.
